file_content.text: Weapons = active // Extermination directive = engaged
Teleporter = active // Combat recommendation = enter Tomb + caution
Target identity = confirmed // Commander Vorel transmission = incoming
Rousing performance, my lord. The Domination Experiments are under control.
You did it, agent. The Domination Experiments are finally under control.
Splendid job, hunter. The Domination Experiments are finally under control.
Impressive work. The Domination Experiments are well under control.
Minutes ago Doctor Neeya revealed the path to the Rakata technology. My strike team already clears the path for its extraction.
Strike team + teleporter entry = success // 0900 hours = contact lost // 0910 hours = life signs critical + confirmed fatalities
Then it's all up to me.
Your strike team served their purpose, Commander. I'll take over from here.
Then it's all up to us.
Good. You must follow them into the unexplored depths of Belsavis.
What teleporter?
Teleporter?
A portal that leads to the unexplored depths of Belsavis.
Your strike team failed.
An expected setback. This changes nothing.
The Rakata sealed their technology within this tomb. Doctor Neeya kindly reopened the teleporter leading inside.
The tomb is glorious! Alive with the Builders' power. But crawling with wretched Esh-kha. Twisted, crazy, no respect for science!
Not even the Esh-kha will slow my march to the Rakata technology.
Nothing will stop me now.
The Rakata's might is almost in my grasp. I can feel it.
This power will soon be mine.
I have complete faith in you, my lord.
The Rakata's influence corrupted these prisoners for millennia. Their strength will be incredible.
The tomb will prove dangerous.
A likely scenario. Though I am sure the risk will not deter you.
Just tell me how to crack this tomb.
Risks are part of the job.
What are "Esh-kha"?
Esh-kha?
Genocidal alien warriors, foes of the Rakata. The survivors of their ancient war have been locked in stasis here for thousands of years.
Crazy Esh-kha? That's bad.
They have slept for millennia in the Rakata's corruptive energy. One can only imagine their strength.
You must pass through the teleporter to enter the tomb. Once inside, neutralize the Esh-kha prisoners and recover the Rakata technology.
Don't forget my Burba Xenowave Scanner! Grab it from the useless strike team, take readings in the tomb. Then my research will be complete!
You'll get your readings.
Perfect. Every sample brings me closer to the Builders.
Simple task from a simple man.
Simple, but vital. Do not forget.
Shut up, doctor.
It all comes down to this. When the Rakata technology is ours, report to Agent Brandis. Triumph for the Empire.
Staging camp = secure // Strike team status = unknown
Then it's all up to us.
